title: Gospel Movie "Come Out of the Bible" | Can We Welcome the Lord's Return by Holding Onto the Bible?

json.text: Her name is Wang Yue. She is a preacher.
In 1989, Wang Yue began to believe in Jesus.
She was fervent within and whenever she had time,
she would preach the gospel.
Soon after, she set up several churches around the village.
However, she never expected that ten years later,
the conditions of the church would worsen day by day.
The co-workers intrigued against each other
and even carved up the church offerings.
The money is the sacrifice the brothers and sisters offered to God.
It is not ordinary money!
Shouldn’t we have fear of the Lord?
Now our church needs money.
We can apply for it if that is the case.
Have we ever prayed for that?
Is it right to fight for the offering box?
In the face of the church desolation,
Wang Yue burned with anxiety yet she was unable to do anything.
She even had no inspiration or light in preaching.
So she visited many churches in the cities and villages,
trying to search for the working of the Holy Spirit.
But what she saw was still desolation.
In this regard, Wang Yue was very perplexed and distressed,
and she often prayed tearfully before the Lord.
In 2003, Wang Yue accepted Almighty God’s end-time work.
Through reading God’s word
and having meetings and fellowships with the brothers and sisters,
she was certain that Almighty God is the returned Jesus.
Later, she read Almighty God’s words,
From Almighty God’s words,
Wang Yue understood God’s eager intention of saving man.
Encouraged by God’s love,
she wanted very much to preach God’s new work
to more brothers and sisters who were eagerly expecting God’s return.
So she joined in preaching the gospel.
With the spreading of the gospel work,
she travelled around many cities and villages.
In 2004, Wang Yue made a special trip to her hometown,
trying to preach God’s end-time work to her relatives.
Hey! You’re … Wu Mei!
Hey, Wu Mei! (Wang Yue!)
Haven’t seen you for years!
Never expected to meet you here! (Yeah!)
How are you?
I’m fine. And you? Are you preaching here?
Yeah, I’m visiting my younger brother. What a coincidence.
Oh, the bus is here. (Ah.)
Wang Yue, today I’ve got something to do.
Stop by my place another day. (OK.)
Here’s my phone number. (All right.)
Remember to call me when you have time. (OK…)
Bye.
See you.
Sister Zhao, Sister Yang,
I’ll preach the gospel to my younger brother tomorrow,
and I’ll stay there for the night.
Hmm. Your brother has been a preacher for over ten years.
So we should rely on God more. (Hmm.)
I see. (Yeah.)
I’m wondering how he is now
and whether he has heard about God’s new work. (Yeah.)
Profiteering from belief is serious in his church!
Elder Fu there is the leader of the denomination,
and he resists God’s end-time work frantically!
We believe that nothing is difficult if we rely on God. (Hmm.)
Let’s pray together
and commit the brothers and sisters in that area to God! (OK. Hmm.)
Hello!
Yeah. Yeah. Right. Right.
Hmm. Ah. I have time.
Hmm.
All right. Hmm.
OK. I’ll go there right away. Ah. OK. Bye.
Pastor Liao, who is it?
Elder Fu asked us to have a meeting in the city.
A brother from America will take photos.
Oh, great!
Thank the Lord!
When shall we go?
Right after the meeting. (Ah. OK!)
Amen!
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord. (Amen!)
Thank the Lord! Please turn to Matthew 6:19-20.
I’ll read it.
Amen! (Amen!)
Well, thank the Lord.
Brothers and sisters, we’ll expound these two verses.
Now we all know that the end time has come.
The signs of the Lord’s return have appeared,
and the Son of man is right at the door.
In the last days, many brothers and sisters become weak and cold.
To minister to them, the church has spent a lot of money.
And now, the offerings become less and less,
and are simply not enough for ministering to brothers and sisters!
Brothers and sisters, as the Lord’s children,
we shouldn’t enjoy His grace freely,
much less indifferently watch others becoming weak
and falling into the world.
Therefore, I hope everyone can offer more.
Then we can be called the Lord’s good children,
and the Lord will doubly bless us.
There will surely be heavenly blessings in store for us.
So we should watch and pray, read the Bible more, and offer more.
The Lord will surely remember us.
Thank the Lord!
That’s all for today’s sharing.
The meeting is over. Amen! (Amen!)
Amen!
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord! (Peace!)
Thank the Lord!
Today, the Lord’s great love brings us together again. (Yes.)
Because of the Lord’s many years of grace and keeping,
we shall offer thanks and praises to Him. (Amen!)
Hallelujah! (Hallelujah!)
Brothers and sisters, recently the “Eastern Lightning” is very rampant here.
Many brothers and sisters in our church have been deceived.
Brothers and sisters,
now we must watch, and guard the flock for the Lord! (Yes.)
Now I’ll declare several rules.
First, every church must guard against strangers (Amen.)
and investigate thoroughly (OK.)
the exact details of seekers and joiners. (OK.)
No one is allowed to receive any unidentified person. (OK.)
Second, none of the brothers and sisters in the churches
are allowed to go elsewhere to hear messages. (Right.)
We can only attend meetings in our own church,
for the Lord’s life and the Lord’s way are already in us. (Right.)
We don’t need to hear others’ messages.
Even if their messages are very good and high, they are deceitful!
The other day, I met your elder sister at the station.
Yesterday I heard that your sister believes in the “Eastern Lightning.”
Is it true?
Who knows?
I haven’t seen her yet. (If you want to drop out,)
it will be too late!
They will use all kinds of means to threaten and tempt you.
They’ll even gouge out your eyes and cut off your ears.
So once you find the people of the “Eastern Lightning”
sneaking in the church or attending meetings in the group,
you should report and reject them immediately
and safeguard the Lord’s way. (Amen!)
Brothers and sisters, have you got it? (Yes.)
Good. If you got it, please raise your hand.
Great. Thank the Lord! (Amen!)
Xiao Wang, (Mm.)
you must have heard about your sister, right?
She believes in the “Eastern Lightning.”
Mm, I’ve heard about it.
Brother Wang, you should pray to the Lord immediately
and curse those who preach the “Eastern Lightning.”
You mustn’t be deceived by your sister! (Mm.)
Brother Wang, it’s really unbelievable. We must be watchful!
Right.
Xiao Wang, we should be faithful to the Lord.
Hmm. Elder Fu, please rest assured.
I understand what you are going to say.
Anyone who betrays the Lord is a Judas.
I’ll reject her even though she’s my sister. (Hmm. Right.)
Xiao Wang, if you can think that way, I won’t be worried.
Thank the Lord! (Thank the Lord!)
Xiao Wang, let’s go. Elder Fu, we’ll go first.
We’ll go first.
Sister Wu.
Yes?
Tomorrow, two sisters from Malaysia will meet with you.
Then, they’ll give you some offerings.
No matter how much they give you,
you should say “Thank the Lord” and take it.
Never refuse it. This is the grace of the Lord.
Oh, I see. (Oh.)
I’m coming.
Xiaoyong!
It’s you!
You didn’t go to work?
Hmm. Come in.
Who’s that?
Xiu’e.
Hey, isn’t this elder sister? I almost can’t recognize you.
Xiu’e, is everything OK?
Wang Yong, still here? Hurry up. It’s too late. (Oh.)
Ah, Xiaoyong. Where are you going?
We have something to do. We’re leaving!
I can receive you. That’s good enough. Stay here tonight!
Sister Wu, how many churches do you have? And how many believers?
I have no church.
How could it be possible?
It’s true!
Maybe the pastor made a mistake!
Sister Wu, you disappointed me so much!
How could you answer like that?
You know, your conversation was recorded.
When they go back, they will play it for those churchgoers overseas
to let others know that they shepherd many people.
That way, the rich will give offerings.
You know, the money they give us each time is only a little.
Your answer disappointed them so much.
And your answer will make our church lose the overseas donations.
The development of our church will be seriously affected!
Why should I play a trick to get money?
It doesn’t match the Lord’s teaching!
Look at yourself. No wonder everyone says that you’re out.
You see, none of the other co-workers are as stupid as you.
The Scripture says,
We are workers for the Lord.
The Lord has prepared everything abundantly for us.
We deserve it. We should thank the Lord’s grace.
Why don’t you understand?
Sister Wu, look at your life.
Don’t all the other co-workers have better food,
clothing, shelter, and daily necessities than you?
Why are you so stubborn? Go home and think it over!
Xiu’e, picking vegetables?
O Lord, my loving Lord Jesus!
You’re my Savior. I thank and praise You!
O Lord, please bind these Satans and devils.
May You close my ears and give me a discerning heart,
because in the end time false Christs and false prophets
will rise to deceive Your children.
O Lord, now the “Eastern Lightning” is so rampant
that they have already deceived many of our sheep.
O Lord, we don’t know what we should do.
Now the church is really too desolate.
O Lord, please guide and lead us.
Pray in the name of the Savior Jesus Christ. (Amen!)
Xiaoyong, let’s have a talk.
We have nothing to talk about. I already know what you came for.
You believe in the “cult.”
Our pastor has informed all the churches about you
and asked us to pray and curse you.
They already know that you’ll surely come to deceive me,
so they told me not to receive you.
Huh! If you were not my sister, I would have driven you out.
Xiaoyong, we’ve believed in the Lord for many years
and have been expecting His return.
Since now we hear that the Lord has come back,
we should seek and investigate carefully,
because it has a lot to do with our destiny and outcome.
We can’t treat it carelessly!
Two thousand years ago,
when the Lord Jesus came to do His work, no one could accept such a fact.
For example,
when Philip preached the gospel to Nathanael, he blurted out,
But what happened in the end?
After hearing the words of the Lord Jesus,
he not only could drop the self
but also could admit immediately, saying,
You say the Lord has come back.
What’s your evidence? How do you know?
Xiaoyong, when God does a stage of new work, man can’t accept it easily.
However, this stage of work exactly fulfills the prophecy of the Lord Jesus
that He will bestow upon man all the truths when He comes again in the end time,
and it also fulfills the prophecy in Revelation
that in the end time there will be the everlasting gospel
to be preached to those who dwell on earth.
The Lord also told us,
That is to say, only if we listen to His word
can we figure out whether the Lord has come back.
There are many similar examples throughout the generations
like Peter and the Samaritan woman.
After they heard the words of the Lord Jesus,
they knew that Jesus was the coming Messiah.
Today Almighty God has expressed millions of words of truth.
As long as you investigate carefully,
you will know whether this is God’s voice or not.
Shut up! Don’t deceive me!
Wanna trick me to read your book? I won’t fall into your scheme!
Xiaoyong, our mother died early.
You and I depended on each other from childhood.
How can I cheat my own brother?
The blood of the Lord Jesus has indeed forgiven our sins,
but it doesn’t mean that we won’t commit sins,
because the sinful nature is still in us.
Thus, we live a life of committing sins in the day
and confessing them at night all the time.
The Bible also records,
To become holy, cast off corruption, and commit no more sins,
we must accept God’s end-time work of judgment and chastisement.
Xiaoyong, if we always hold on to our notion
and refuse to accept God’s end-time work,
we’ll lose God’s salvation!
At that time, when the Lord Jesus came to do His work,
the Pharisees kept the law,
willfully condemned and judged the new work Jesus did,
and nailed Him onto the cross alive.
They not only offended God’s disposition but also received God’s punishment!
Xiaoyong, Xiu’e,
how can I stand by and watch you follow in the Pharisees’ footsteps?
You have no qualification to teach me! Get out!
Xiaoyong.
Get out!
Xiaoyong!
Xiaoyong!
Wait until next year to have another child, a healthy baby boy! (All right.)
All right.
Who is it? Who do you want? Auntie, I’m Wang Yue.
Wang Yue? Eh, Wang Yong’s sister.
Oh, Wang Yong’s sister.
What’s up?
Could I stay here tonight?
Stay here? (Mm.)
Mm. OK. Come in!
Thank you, Auntie!
Sister Xue.
Wang Yue?
Wang Yue, we dare not receive you.
If our pastor learns of it, we’ll be expelled. Leave quickly. Go! Go! Sister Xue. Sister Xue…
Where’s your mom?
In the room.
In the room?
What are you doing?
If you want to preach the “Eastern Lightning,” just forget it. (Sister.)
Sister, listen to me! Sister…
I heard that Wang Yue believes in the “Eastern Lightning”!
Yes. Yesterday I went to the church.
The pastor told us not to contact her,
because we will be in great trouble after believing in it.
Is it true? (Yes.)
I heard that if one believes in the “Eastern Lightning,”
his eyes will be gouged out and his ears and nose will be cut off.
Right. Right. Yeah.
How is she now?
I don’t know. I haven’t seen her yet.
Sisters, you are all here.
Wang Yue? The pastor says that you’ve believed in the “Eastern Lightning.”
Don’t try to deceive us. Whatever you say, we won’t believe you.
Yes. Wang Yue, we never expected that
you would believe in the “Eastern Lightning.”
Go. Go. Go. Go. Let’s go quickly.
Sisters…
Haven’t eaten yet?
What’s the matter? Why have you lost your spirit?
Sister, were you driven out?
Come. Have some water.
I never expected that my brother would be so resistant. (Mm.)
I preached God’s end-time work to him,
but he drove me out late at night.
Fortunately, someone took me in.
Don’t be sad.
Come. Have dinner first!
Have dinner, OK? (Mm.)
Today I also went to preach the gospel
to several brothers and sisters I had shepherded before.
Unexpectedly, they didn’t even let me in the door.
Mm. Sister, there is God’s permission in such an environment today.
Let’s fellowship together after you finish eating. (Mm.)
Eat it. (Mm.)
Sister, don’t be too sad.
God has paid such a great price to bring each of us before Him.
With love and patience,
the brothers and sisters preached the gospel to us many times.
If not for God’s great love, we couldn’t know God today.
The brothers and sisters could make such efforts,
because they had understood God’s will.
Let’s read a passage of God’s word.
You read it. Come on, sister.
From God’s words, we can see
that in God’s heart, He has been expecting more brothers and sisters
to come before Him and accept His commission.
Since God’s new work started,
many brothers and sisters have been bound and restrained
by the leaders of the religious world.
They can’t receive the supply of God’s word,
and have been living in the darkness.
How anxious God’s heart is!
The brothers and sisters drive us out,
because they are instigated by others
and know nothing about the true fact.
Then, shouldn’t we even more try our best
to cooperate with God and bring those brothers and sisters
who genuinely believe in God before Him earlier
so as to comfort His heart?
Yes. The brothers and sisters are innocent.
In retrospect, before I accepted this stage of work,
didn’t I reject in every possible way
because of believing the pastor’s words?
If God hadn’t moved me and if the brothers and sisters
hadn’t preached the gospel to me again and again with love and patience
and brought me before God, (Yeah.)
how could I have today?
If these brothers and sisters still believe these pastors’ rumors blindly
and refuse to accept the true way,
their opportunity to be saved will be ruined by these pastors.
These religious people’s behaviors remind me of a word of the Lord Jesus,
Yeah.
Now these leaders of the religious world
for the sake of position and profit, stop at nothing to resist God
and hinder the spreading of God’s end-time gospel.
They are exactly the Pharisees who hinder people from coming before God!
I shouldn’t be passive any longer!
Let’s spare no effort to cooperate with God
and bring those brothers and sisters who genuinely believe in God
before Him earlier so as to comfort His heart. (Mm.)
We should never allow Satan’s schemes to succeed.
Well, on my way here,
I met my good friend Wu Mei who grew up with me at the railway station.
I want to visit her. Perhaps she will listen to me.
I heard that Wu Mei has a good humanity.
You can visit her and preach the gospel to her.
God’s sheep hear God’s voice. Let’s pray for it together. (OK.)
Mm.
Wang Yue and other brothers and sisters visited Wu Mei
and preached God’s end-time gospel to her.
At the beginning, Wu Mei was somewhat resistant and alert.
But during the contact,
she found that those people were nothing like what the rumors described.
They weren’t like gangsters, but were full of love and patience
and had inspiration in their preaching.
And she had great enjoyment when listening to their preaching.
Although she had many religious notions,
the brothers and sisters always sustained her with patience.
Therefore, she decided to investigate.
Through a period of thirsty seeking and pray-reading,
Wu Mei was certain that Almighty God’s word is indeed God’s personal utterance
and is the little scroll which has already been opened.
That was because from Almighty God’s word,
she understood the origin of mankind’s corruption,
knew God’s six-thousand-year management plan
and the inside truth of the three stages of works,
knew the meaning of God’s names,
the mystery of incarnation and mankind’s destination,
and understood the inside truth of the Bible
as well as the pathway and direction for man to become holy and be saved.
Wu Mei deeply felt that she understood a lot from Almighty God’s word.
In those years, she contacted many excellent preachers,
but none of them could explain the mysteries in the Bible so clearly.
Only God Godself can tell these heavenly mysteries to man
and express God’s will so clearly.
At last, Wu Mei was certain that
Almighty God is the returned Jesus and is the appearing of the true God.
Thus, she completely broke away from the bondage of the religious world
and returned before Almighty God.
If not for your fellowship today,
I really don’t know what greater evil I might do.
I really thank God for giving me an opportunity to receive such salvation.
I don’t know how to repay God’s love
and receive God’s forgiveness and tolerance.
I’ve believed in God for so many years,
but I never expected that I knew nothing about God.
With the letters of the Bible in my hands,
I teach others every day, but I myself am doing evil.
The consequence will be really terrible.
I thank God so much for giving me such an opportunity
to repent and confess my sins.
As long as you can come before God, God’s heart will be greatly comforted.
A few days ago, I went to preach the gospel to my brother.
Unexpectedly, he resisted and rejected in every way.
In the end, he drove me out.
I also went to visit your cousin, Sister Qian,
and several other brothers and sisters.
Unexpectedly, they were all deceived by Pastor Liao
and even didn’t let me in the door.
Trust me.
My cousin has a good humanity and believes in God genuinely. (Mm.)
I’ll fellowship with her and read God’s word for her. (Mm.)
She will accept it. (OK.)
Then, we’ll bring the brothers and sisters around her before God.
Under God’s leading, Wu Mei cooperated actively
and brought all the brothers and sisters she shepherded
to listen to the preaching.
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord. (Peace!)
Today I’ll introduce a preacher to you.
Perhaps you knew her before.
Sister Wang Yue, Brother Wang Yong’s elder sister.
Sister Wang preaches much better than me,
and her preaching is very beneficial to our life.
Today, we’ll welcome Sister Wang to preach.
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord. (Peace!)
Thank God for preparing such an opportunity for us to fellowship today.
Also, thank you for coming here to listen to the preaching.
It is God’s love that connects us together.
Today we can gather to seek and fellowship about the Lord’s will,
and this is God’s special preparation.
We offer our thanks and praises to God for this. (Thank God!)
Since our Lord Jesus resurrected and ascended,
all those who follow the Lord have been expecting Him to come back early,
so as to receive His promise and enjoy His blessing.
Especially in the end time, we expect the Lord’s return more eagerly.
Why haven’t we seen Wu Mei recently?
Couldn’t reach her phone? Go and visit her.
I suspect that she may have been deceived
by the people of the “Eastern Lightning.”
Impossible! Wu Mei always knows her own mind.
How could she rashly contact the people of the “Eastern Lightning”?
At the beginning, I also thought so.
However, the “Eastern Lightning” is so terrible.
Some believers who pursue relatively hard and the preachers
are all the targets of their deception!
These “Eastern Lightning”…
Ah. It’s indeed impossible for us to guard against them.
It’s really unexpected.
Wu Mei was actually deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
Pastor Liao, do you think we should dial 110 to catch Wang Yue?
No. It’s not proper to catch her today.
Anyway, bring Wu Mei back first. (Yeah.)
Sister, will you please fellowship with us about this question?
OK. Today let’s fellowship about it.
You’re a wolf in sheep’s clothing!
How dare you come here to steal sheep!
Out! Get out! Get out now!
Pastor Liao, hey, how could you treat them like this?
Pastor Liao, what’re you doing? We’re all believers in God.
If you have any question, we can fellowship together. (Humph!)
Yeah.
Fellowship what? I tell you: I don’t wanna see you again. Out! (Go!) Get out now!
Don’t expect to deceive any of us today! Get out now! (Out!)
Get away!
Pastor Liao, I’m surprised that you would do this today!
Didn’t you often preach that we should love our enemies?
If what we hold fast to is the true way,
why should we fear a false one?
Isn’t my doing so all for your good?
You’re too small in stature and know nothing at all!
If you wanna listen to the message, I’ll preach to you!
Pastor Liao, though I’m small in stature,
I know that the Lord Jesus teaches us to love our enemies.
And you often preach it to us.
But today you treated them like this;
didn’t you disobey the Lord’s teaching?
Moreover, we hold fast to the Lord’s way and trust the Savior Jesus;
why do we fear a false one?
Something true won’t fear something false.
Why do we avoid the topic like this and dare not fellowship with them?
If we rely on the Lord Jesus’ power to debate with them,
can’t we also put Satan to shame?
We just dodged the matter like this; isn’t it humiliating?
Right. Didn’t you usually preach that in meetings?
Hmm, we shouldn’t treat them like this.
It’s not glorifying the Lord! (Yes!)
What do you know about it? They even stop reading the Bible.
Any belief that departs from the Bible is a heresy, a cult!
What’s wrong?
No, we can’t leave like this. I feel very uneasy.
Yeah, we preach the gospel to testify God
and bring the sheep that belong to God back to His family.
Leaving like this, we’re not satisfying God!
Just now I thought of those brothers’ and sisters’ hungry and thirsty eyes.
They’re all eagerly waiting for the Lord’s coming again,
while we just gave up because of such a little difficulty.
This is not caring for God’s will!
We’d better go back and try to stay
and fellowship with the brothers and sisters.
Okay, let’s go back quickly! (Hmm. OK.)
Pastor Liao, I find that there are Biblical bases in their fellowship.
They still read the Bible. I remember that Proverbs says,
And you often preach it to us.
But today you drove them out so impulsively even without listening.
You lost the Lord’s testimony!
Wu Mei, you seem to be deeply poisoned!
I never expected that you would get this far!
You know why I do this? Isn’t it all for protecting you?
Then, you won’t share in evil! (Right.)
Pastor Liao, if you really want to protect us, you should debate with them,
so that we can have a clear distinction between right and wrong. (Yes.)
I remember that the Bible records,
Now the brothers and sisters
are all weak in spirit, cold in faith, and hungry and thirsty.
However, we keep them under close control in the church,
neither letting them listen to the message
nor allowing them to receive others.
If this continues, won’t they all get dry in spirit?
We lead the church like this; is it protecting the flock?
Pastor Liao, you say that the “Eastern Lightning” is a heresy
and it departs from the Bible.
But we hold the sword of the truth the Lord Jesus bestows to us,
so we can absolutely debate with them.
The Bible says,
What shall we fear?
Relying on the Lord, we may well debate with them over right and wrong.
But why don’t we even have such faith in the Lord?
I don’t fear them.
I just feel it unnecessary to debate with them!
Such a debate is very necessary!
The brothers and sisters
can gain discernment from it and avoid being deceived.
Right. It’s good to discern. (Hmm.)
After we discern clearly, we don’t need to avoid them.
Yeah, we shouldn’t just avoid.
Sister Wang!
Pastor Liao, now we’ve come back
only to tell the brothers and sisters the news that the Lord has returned.
So they can know.
If we have different opinions, we can discuss and debate it.
Then won’t it be clear who’s right?
Yeah. Pastor Liao and I were just talking about it.
Whether it’s true or false will be verified with facts.
Yes, it should have been like this.
Today we’re gonna hear a good message. (Yes.)
Sister Wang, come! Please have a seat. (Hmm.)
Wang Yue, today I don’t wanna talk to you too much.
You just answer me one question.
You all say that the Lord Jesus has come back
and He has begun a new work, has expressed new words,
and even stops man from reading the Bible.
Today you must make it clear.
Right, make it clear! (Yeah.)
Brothers and sisters, God’s work and word are all in the Bible.
Only the Bible is the canon of Christianity. (Amen!)
Through several thousand years,
believers all over the world believe in the Lord on the basis of the Bible.
Amen!
Thus we can see the absolute authority and position of the Bible.
So, only those who hold on to the Bible won’t be deceived! (Amen!)
The Bible is the only criterion for us to be saved in believing in the Lord.
Amen!
The way that accords with the Bible is the true way!
Any belief that departs from the Bible is a heresy! (Amen!)
Pastor Liao, just now you said,
“God won’t do the work of salvation apart from the Bible.
Any belief that departs from the Bible is a heresy.”
This reminds me of a question,
that is, what came first, the Bible or God’s work?
I think it’s God’s work.
Hmm. Yes!
In the beginning, Jehovah created the heavens and the earth and all things,
and did such works as destroying the world by the flood
and burning Sodom and Gomorrah.
At the time God did these works, did the Old Testament exist?
How could it exist? (Yeah. Yes.)
Yeah, at the time God did these works, the Bible didn’t exist.
That is to say,
God’s work came first and then the record of the Bible.
Furthermore, in the Age of the Grace,
when the Lord Jesus worked, the New Testament didn’t exist.
The New Testament was formed in a religious conference after 300 A.D.
Religious leaders from different countries
selected the Four Gospels from the disciples’ records of Jesus’ work,
and they added some of the apostles’ letters to the churches
and Revelation recorded by the disciple John.
They compiled these contents together into the New Testament.
Brothers and sisters,
from the Bible’s compilation process, we can know
that the Bible is only a record of the history of God’s previous work.
Without God’s work, there wouldn’t be the Biblical record.
That is, God doesn’t work according to the Bible
and He isn’t restricted by the Bible,
